Articles.Content:
this was my first rocket to get in to orbit and is very special

u dont have 2 download it but its good for beginners to get used to the game

if u r struggling u should try this out

it is very basic 

USES STOCK PARTS

NO MODS

ENJOY!!!!!!!!!!

you will need 0.13 or above to download this

go here to watch my video that i made on this craft

[https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!153&id=99F104C10E21B212%21153#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21154](https://skydrive.live.com/?cid=99f104c10e21b212&resid=99F104C10E21B212!153&id=99F104C10E21B212%21153#cid=99F104C10E21B212&id=99F104C10E21B212%21154)
I notice a distinct lack of a way to get back to Kerbin alive.

it does have a parachute but is mainly designed to do orbital moves

it also has a solid rocket to bring u back if you are quite close eg under 40,000m

> 
> it does have a parachute but is mainly designed to do orbital moves
> 
> it also has a solid rocket to bring u back if you are quite close eg under 40,000m

Your pictures don\'t show either of those features.

> 
> sorry wrong rocket

 there is a parachute
in your face

Here\'s a small suggestion:

Spelling and Grammar. 

Without it, I won\'t look at anything.
